data.title: New Balance CoCo CG1 Tennis Shoe Review | Tennis Express
data.description: There is one WTA tour player with a signature shoe, and it is Coco Gauff. The young star plays a brilliant backcourt style of tennis with incredible defense, but has also proven to be a threat on the doubles court. The New Balance shoe features a basketball style mid-top design, which locks the heel in place nicely. The CG1 is designed to hold up to the needs of aggressive movers, and athletes that leave it all out there on the court.Shop the New Balance Coco CG1 at Tennis Express: https://www.tennisexpress.com/new-balance-tennis-shoes

data.title: In tennis, no shortage of temper tantrums and tirades
data.description: On the Internet, tennis is synonymous with temper tantrums, tirades, and meltdowns. In fact, that's the name of several YouTube clips devoted to scene after scene of a tennis player shouting at an umpire, gesticulating wildly at baselines, or smashing rackets to smithereens.
